Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes to generate Entity Data Model (EDM) files and object source code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design> classes support the EDM tools. For more information about the EDM tools, see [ADO.NET Entity Data Model Tools](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/91076853-0881-421b-837a-f582f36be527).
